attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having at one time been in receipt of benefits i know only to well of the trap in which people who depend on handouts find themselves .However there are so many who are content to just sit there and do nothing about the situation thay are in.I feel the system of job seeking is wrong .To expect people who do not want to work to actively seek work is very short sighted .I would like to see job interviews  being allocated to job seekers rather than expecting the unemployed to look for the jobs would be a far better system than is currently in place .I feel six weeks to find a job should be enough for anyone.After this time job allocation should be enforced and if not adhered to would result in a cut in the persons handouts. We need to stop the tide of lazyness that is taking over this country.thank you

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
